captions.text: Spooky Car Wash Prank
On September 30, 2014, 30 Strangers were asked to stop for a car wash on the way to a filmed test drive.
They never reached their final destinations.
Closed car wash. Do not attempt.
I want to have that in view.

So just dont turn
on the air.
Like two years ago...
If it's the car wash I think it is, it is the one up here on the left, which I go to sometimes after work.

They were doing like the free coffees
and you know what? I love their coffee.

You got a tip? I don't. That was all that was
given to me. Seriously? Sorry.
What does he want?
Holy crap.
I'm so scared!
Why is it so dark?
Okay, you guys. What is going on?

Is this what it's like normally? Nah, dude.
Not at all.
Did you see how scary...
It is really dark... It's not normally this dark.
Wait...
Oh my gosh!  Woah!
We need to get the F***k out of here. What is happening?
This better be it. I probably will never go in a car wash again.
What the...!
Car Wash
Happy Halloween

comments.text:
For most of us, the scariest thing about a car wash is the price tag. As a 
Halloween prank, Ford enlisted some actors in scary masks to swarm people's 
vehicles inside a car wash. Between that and the spooky lighting, drivers 
get predictably freaked out. Check out the video below.﻿
